info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 11:14AM CDT until June 12 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Clinton County in south central Illinois... Southern Bond County in south central Illinois... Southwestern Fayette County in south central Illinois... * Until noon CDT. * At 1113 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Reno, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Greenville and Pocahontas around 1125 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Beaver Creek and Tamalco. This includes Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 36 and 45. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
